sources.name: Employees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

transformations.name: LookupIDs
transformations.script:
TypeConversions1, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversions1@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
LookupIDs split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates, TypeConversions exists(ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates@RegionCode == DimEmployees@RegionCode,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
